page.title: 07FARM VISIT,POSBURY
page.content: On Monday,17th June we went to see two farms,Demmitts and Ravenswood.Demmitts belongs to Mr & Mrs Pope and Ravenswood to Mr & Mrs Harris, but Mrs Harris runs the farm.First of all we went to see Bella the cow, and her calf,Mrs Harris fed Bella and her calf and two other calves were fed aswell. They were different breeds,Bella was a Jersey cow, her calf was a Limousin cross Jersey,the others were one Charolais and one Hereford.When they had been fed,Carli and Becky let Squirrel and Beauty out.Squirrel and Beauty are their ponies.When we let them out they went mad around the field and galloping fast.We saw the chickens,there were about 15,to 20.We saw some empty stables which were for at least 300 calves or cows.They go in to the stables from September to April.We walked on and saw some more
